column2: "Hey, I've been seeing you around lately. You've been putting in some work."
"But don't try to do everything yourself. Working with a team helps and its that much safer too."
"If you're forming a party, then I recommend going with hunters."
"They can be a sturdy wall to protect the rest of the party, so they come in handy."
"If you're talking about party balance, then all Hunters works fine. You really don't need anything else."
"When you're in need: take hunters. That's the ticket. Later!"
